org.jhotdraw.app.action
Class CutAction

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.AbstractAction
      javax.swing.text.TextAction
          javax.swing.text.DefaultEditorKit.CutAction
              org.jhotdraw.app.action.CutAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action
public class CutAction
extends javax.swing.text.DefaultEditorKit.CutAction

Cuts the selected region and places its contents into the system clipboard. Acts on the EditableComponent or JTextComponent which had the focus when the ActionEvent was generated.

See Also:
